Description: The Rest in Egypt; landscape with the Virgin and child sitting against a tree at left, the Infant John the Baptist and two putti playing with a lamb at right, Joseph asleep in background; after Peter Paul Rubens Engraving
Curator's comments: For another impression and comment see 1891,0414.592.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (undescribed)
Schneevoogt 1873 / Catalogue des estampes gravées d'après P.P.Rubens (25.115)
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Baptist (Prodromos)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Nan Ino Cooper, Baroness Lucas of Crudwell and Lady Dingwall (L.1696)
In Memory of: Auberon Thomas Herbert, 9th Baron Lucas of Crudwell and 5th Lord Dingwall
